name: Pizza Dash (Ace Savaid)
description:
Pizza Dash is a small sort game made in less than 4 hours for the Low Effort Jam 18.

Play a pizza boy as he completes orders.

  • Get orders from the register
  • Collect items from the kitchen
  • Submit items to the register to receive next order.
Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point/select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Touchscreen

1 finger- move to point/select

2 finger tap - Menu/ Cancel

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets - RPG Maker MV
